name: Rose (geckolocation)
description:
Compass Rose fighting game

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
UPDATE
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

known bugs

-timer not working
-possible to get stuck in stage by jumping into it at the right angle

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

CONTROLS

p1:
move: arrow keys
attack: d
special: s
jump: a
block: LShift

p2: 
move: G, V, B, N
attack: p
special: o
jump: i
block: j

menu:
move: arrow keys
select: enter 
back: esc

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

versus: play against a friend on the same keyboard

practice: play against an AI opponent

options: change keyboard controls
[use left and right menu controls to select the column you want to edit, then hit enter, next press the key you want to use that corresponds to the arrow on the left]

quit: closes the game
